atk-s0517a10:2_0: 237. Idāni tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānakaraṁ ariyamaggaṁ dassentena kathitāya
atk-s0517a10:2_1: maggakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā. Tattha maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggoti yo buddhasāsane
atk-s0517a10:2_2: maggoti vuccati, so kenaṭṭhena maggo nāma hotīti attho. Micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāyātiādīsu
atk-s0517a10:2_3: dasasu pariyāyesu paṭhamo paṭhamo tassa tassa maggaṅgassa ujuvipaccanīkavasena vutto.
atk-s0517a10:2_4: Maggo ceva hetu cāti tassa tassa kiccassa karaṇāya paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo, sampāpakaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a10:2_5: hetu. Tena maggassa paṭipadaṭṭho sampāpakaṭṭho ca vutto hoti. “Ayaṁ maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a10:2_6: hi paṭipadā maggo, “maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho”tiādīsu sampāpako hetu. Evaṁ dvīhi
atk-s0517a10:2_7: dvīhi padehi “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo”ti pucchāya vissajjanaṁ kataṁ hoti. Sahajātānaṁ
atk-s0517a10:2_8: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāyāti attanā sahajātānaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ sahajātaaññamaññanissayādibhāvena
atk-s0517a10:2_10: khepanāya. Paṭivedhādivisodhanāyāti ettha yasmā “ko cādi kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, sīlañca
atk-s0517a10:2_11: suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti vacanato sīlañca diṭṭhi ca saccapaṭivedhassa ādi.
atk-s0517a10:2_12: So ca ādimaggakkhaṇe visujjhati. Tasmā “paṭivedhādivisodhanāyā”ti vuttaṁ. Cittassa
atk-s0517a10:2_13: adhiṭṭhānāyāti sampayuttacittassa sakakicce patiṭṭhānāya. Cittassa vodānāyāti cittassa
atk-s0517a10:2_14: parisuddhabhāvāya. Visesādhigamāyāti lokiyato visesapaṭilābhāya. Uttari paṭivedhāyāti
atk-s0517a10:2_15: lokiyato uttari paṭivijjhanatthāya. Saccābhisamayāyāti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ ekābhisamayāya
atk-s0517a10:2_16: kiccanipphattivasena ekapaṭivedhāya. Nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāyāti cittassa vā puggalassa
atk-s0517a10:2_17: vā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpanatthāya. Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇādīsu aṭṭha maggaṅgāni ekato katvā
atk-s0517a10:2_18: taṁtaṁmaggavajjhakilesappahānaṁ vuttaṁ. Evaṁ vacane kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Yasmā
atk-s0517a10:2_19: uparūparimaggenāpi suṭṭhu ādivisodhanā suṭṭhu cittavodānañca hoti, tasmā tānipi padāni vuttāni.
atk-s0517a10:3_0: Dassanamaggotiādīhi yāva pariyosānā tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇavasena maggaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a10:3_1: Tāni sabbānipi padāni abhiññeyyaniddese vuttatthāneva. Evamettha yathāsambhavaṁ lokiyalokuttaro
atk-s0517a10:3_2: maggo niddiṭṭho. Hetuṭṭhena maggoti ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo niddiṭṭho. Nippariyāyamaggattā
atk-s0517a10:3_3: cassa puna “maggo”ti na vuttaṁ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāti ādīni ca indriyādīnaṁ
atk-s0517a10:3_4: atthavasena vuttāni, na maggaṭṭhavasena. Saccānīti cettha saccañāṇāni. Sabbepi te
atk-s0517a10:3_5: dhammā nibbānassa paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo. Ante vuttaṁ nibbānaṁ pana saṁsāradukkhābhibhūtehi
atk-s0517a10:3_6: dukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sappurisehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti maggoti vuttanti veditabbanti.
